language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect

annotation: To smoke, give off smoke (Mlr) smoke n. [<]
ultimately of Mon-Khmer origin but reconstructs to Proto-Chamic

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: (from distance, a column of, also steam, vapour)
Emit smoke, to foam, create spray (Fth)
